name: About:Blank Nighty FireFox Revolutions
description:
Well I'm back with the last version of Nighty FireFox; A combination of the two first ones, and a little shadow on the logo ;-)
Hope you like; and thanks to all who creates these wonderfull styles and gave me inspiration to 'create' 
Some comments about my work will not harm anybody [that includes myself]

Untill the next one
